Note:

Title(s): Northern Homily Cycle; The Hermit and the Thieves
_description: The Hermit and the Thieves, in the Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Ane Ermite woned in a wasterneþat litil gude had to
                    therne…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Meke ihesu lorde euer more vs spedeTo meke oure hertes &
                    þider vs lede

Thompson,  Anne B.,

                    rede…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…Nowe ihesu crist oure heuene kyngTo þat blisse vs alle
                    nowe bryng
